website_summaries.verdict: The Brooks Adrenaline GTS 17 was agreeable enough, according to many testers. The supportive and stable mid-sole worked well for a lot of them. There were those who also welcomed its cool design and its secure construction. Conversely, a number of runners weren’t able to acclimate well to it; there were concerns about its sizing scheme, its width, and the responsiveness of its platform. But overall, many were able to enjoy this road stability running shoe.
pros: A runner commented that using the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 17 for a half-marathon didn’t cause any blistering or pain
A tester stated that, for a shoe that has a bulky look, it was surprisingly lightweight
Several consumers reported that it was great for both running and walking
Many testers considered this shoe to be a very comfortable running companion
A lot of runners appreciated the stability mechanism that’s present in this model, stating that it prevented them from discomfort and injury
The visual style of this model worked well, according to those who have purchased it
The cushioning system received some recognition for being responsive, supportive and long-lasting
The forefoot section was roomy enough to let the toes spread naturally, several consumers wrote
cons: A number of testers reported that the mid-sole platform was too stiff and unwieldy
it apparently caused them some underfoot discomfort
Some runners commented that its toe box was narrow and that it caused some discomfort to the forefoot section
A reviewer complained that the front section of the upper unit rubbed against the small toe, causing some irritation
A few testers felt that it was the insole that actually made the interior environment feel tight

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as earlier versions.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 pairs of the Gts 14 as they fitted so well, finally had to take the plunge and get some new ones. The reviews convinced me that these should fit the bill, but in reality they aren't the same 'fit' as the earlier ones. The 'fix' to stop the trainer wearing out when worn by those of us with odd shaped feet, the reinforced band just behind the big toe, has meant that these are now noticeably tighter. I thought they'd wear in but rather than doing so, in my case anyway, they have become more uncomfortable. Disappointed in the these but, in fairness, it may just be my odd feet shape.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've had Brooks Adrenaline GTS for a while and they are very comfortable so decided to get another pair as the old one's were wearing down These one's were different to the one's I've got as they have reflective strips whereas the same ones before didn't so not sure what happened there They are very comfortable and do exactly what they need to Only thing with slight concern was that they make my feet very hot and sweat a lot which was not the case in the previous pair
customer_reviews.author: H Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of the brand. Having been fitted in a running shop for Brooks a few years back I buy all my training pairs on line. The last pair lasted 300km running on average 3x a week. Hopefully these will be similar. The heel is higher than I was expecting but I was able to put in some good time when I broke them in last night. The colour looks great. One thing I do like is the lace eyelets. Although I have not had a problem with the other pairs these look more sturdy
customer_reviews.author: N Woodley

customer_reviews.title: This is my 3rd pair
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first Brooks GTS in 2010, and they lasted about 4 years, running about 20km a week. My second pair lasted 3 years. This pair is just as good as the others, and in three or four years time I know exactly what I'll be buying
customer_reviews.author: Kamran Rahman

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These were bought ready to replace a pair my partner had been fitted for professionally so knew they'd be ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Fiadh

customer_reviews.title: Superb, just go one size up from your normal everyday shoes.
customer_reviews.text: You need to go up one UK shoe size from normal with trainers. I'm usually an 8 UK (42 Eur, 9 US) but for these trainers I need a 9 UK (44 Eur, 10 US). Superb trainers, by the way. I've just bought my 4th pair of GTS17 having been using them since the original GTS Mk1 waaaay back in 2001 and replacing them at least once a year from there on: that's well over 20 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: Si_&_Ally

customer_reviews.title: The best running shoes I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: I've been running for a number of years and have been through a number of running shoes of varying comfort. These are by far the most comfortable. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jez

customer_reviews.title: Looks and felt cheap
customer_reviews.text: I was in love with brooks gts 13,14,16 ...but these shoes just felt cheap and light and very different than what I was expecting from my favourite brand ... felt fake - I returned them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but no grip on wet surfaces
customer_reviews.text: The trainers are really comfortable and fit perfectly even for my wide feet. The only reason it’s not a 5 star review is that they are extremely slippy when the ground is wet and you have to be careful to avoid drain covers and granite. I nearly fell a few times whilst running!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seemed a slightly narrow fit at first but having worn them several times they are a comfy fit.
customer_reviews.author: seasider

customer_reviews.title: Hubby seems to like them. They were recommended by his physio
customer_reviews.text: Had t o return usual size and go up half a size. Was trouble free return though so no problem. Hubby seems to like them. They were recommended by his physio.
customer_reviews.author: zoe

customer_reviews.title: Brooks GTS17
customer_reviews.text: First time I've run in Brooks and I absolutely love em. I went up 1/2 a size and the fit is perfect. So good I brought a second pair immediately. A pleasure to run in.
customer_reviews.author: NothingFake

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, on my 4th or 5th pair now, soooooooo comfortable
customer_reviews.author: S. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great price, great trainer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Brooks Adrenaline. As soon as I put these on I knew that I should have done it sooner. As someone who overpronates, these trainers are great for supporting my footfall. Great fit, great price, great trainer!!
customer_reviews.author: N J.

customer_reviews.title: A very good running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I already had a pair of these (different colour) and had completed 485 miles in them so it was easy to just get another pair online. They are great. I will probably get another pair sooner this time though and alternate them.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Larter

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for pronaters
customer_reviews.text: Have to buy men’s shoes as have a very wide foot because of bunion- these shoes , and all the previous Adrenaline, are a great fit with decent toe box and lots of support
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, quality, nice looking trainer.
customer_reviews.text: Marvellous trainer fits like a glove as you can always expect from Brooks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's the best choice for anyone like me have a flat foot 👍🏾
customer_reviews.author: mousab

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me - heavy runner doing 5k up to half marathon at slowish pace.
customer_reviews.text: Picked my original pair of these after having my gait analysed on a treadmill. They’re so good I replaced with an identical pair. One thing to watch for, I did 500 miles or so in previous pair, and now I’ve got the new ones I realise I should have replaced them some time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sticks

customer_reviews.title: Odd sizing - wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Real slipping round the heel cup area - actually feels like a moon boot and I have since switched to a more minimal option (Saucony Kinvara 8).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I ordered new running shoes and all I got were these used ones....
customer_reviews.text: I received these shoes today and they have been used (see photograph).... I need them for the Great North Run on Sunday so can't return them - but this isn't right....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diffrent colour designs not always the same shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just be carful of which shoe colour you go for. I had a pair of the blue GTS 17's, they were fantastic, a lot of support around the tongue for the top of your foot. When i came to order a new pair from Amazon, I decided to go for a more fancy looking GTS 17, the grey neon shoe. Thinking its the same shoe but just a different colour. How wrong was I. The tongue support was wafer thin, nothing like the blue colour shoes that hold your feet in with comfort. I found my feet were moving around and were really uncomfortable. I will stick to the blue shoe in future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap shoe. If you are searching for Asics Adrenaline GTS 17 this is not it. 100% not worth £80. If it was £20 I wouldn't be so angry, but you're damning £80 for plastic and crappy material?
customer_reviews.author: Lesha

customer_reviews.title: Great stable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes. I bought these running shoes because they whee recommended after getting knee problems/pain. Since using these shoes I've had no more pain in knee fantastic. Gives a very stable feel when running.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

product_meta.title: Brooks Men's Adrenaline Gts 17 Gymnastics Shoes
